message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think you'll find it's a great opportunity. Would you like to make an initial offer?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9000 for the product, and I'm willing to make a decision today if we can agree on a price.

I understand you're close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can meet you at $9500, but I need to emphasize that this is my final offer. I'm not willing to go any lower than this.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9250 for the product, and I'm willing to make a decision today if we can agree on a price.

I understand you're getting close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm not leaving money on the table. I can meet you at $9500, but I'll throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a 1-year warranty and a free consultation. Can we meet at $9500 with these extras?

I appreciate the extras you're offering, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $9000 for the product, and I'm willing to take the extras. If we can meet at this price, I'll make a decision today.

I'm willing to meet you at $9000, Bob, but I need to clarify that the extras I mentioned earlier are only included if you're willing to pay the full price of $9500. If you're willing to meet me at $9000, I'll throw in a 6-month warranty, but the extras will be removed. Can we agree on this?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still not willing to pay $9000. I'm willing to meet you at $8800, and I'll take the 6-month warranty. That's the best I can do.
